text: Monica Roberts (May 4, 1962 â€“ October 5, 2020) was an African-American blogger, writer, and transgender rights activist. She was the founding editor of TransGriot, a blog focusing on issues about to trans women, many of which minorities. She was born in Houston, Texas. Roberts died on October 5, 2020 in Houston from a pulmonary embolism at the age of 58. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pulmonary embolism Category:American LGBT rights activists Category:Journalists from Texas Category:Writers from Houston Category:American bloggers
title: Monica Roberts
